### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#27854](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27854) ([WIP] add a stratum v2 template provider by ccdle12)
* [#27607](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27607) (index: improve initialization and pruning violation check by furszy)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

 Nit: We may want to remove `BCLog::Util` as well, since `SetSyscallSandboxPolicy` was its only user.
